## InternalUrlParamsToUnion type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type InternalUrlParamsToUnion<T extends string> =
  T extends `${infer Current}/${infer Rest}`
    ? InternalUrlParamsToUnion<Current> | InternalUrlParamsToUnion<Rest>
    : T extends `:${infer K}`
    ? K
    : never
```
